name: Build Champs
description:
This is a game about flopping around and pushing things and pulling things into other things and having large "buildings" fall down.  One way to play is to try and be the last person on the platform. Another way to play is to try and stop a building collapsing or to escape a collapsing building. Often this won't be possible with just one person. You can do whatever you want to do! Abandoning your friend in need is even more fun with large blocks of concrete and very poorly designed trees. Pushing your friend off a ledge is super fun so get this game!

Controls:

Player 1: WASD, and Left Control to grab.

Player 2: Up, Down, Left Right and  .  to grab.

n to go the the next level, r to go to a random one.
